mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evaluation(evaNum, productNum, evaTitle, evaWriter, evaContent, regdate) VALUES(#{evaNum}, #{productNum}, #{evaTitle}, #{evaWriter}, #{evaContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT evaNum, evaTitle, evaWriter, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY"/"MM"/"DD" "HH24":"MI') AS regdate FROM evaluation ORDER BY regdate DESC
